resources.string: Send only %1$s (%2$s) from %3$s network to this address. Using other tokens and networks may result in loss of funds.
This feature is disabled in Demo mode
The selected does not support the %1$s network

To activate the %1$s blockchain\'s cryptographic encryption, you\'ll need to reset the wallet to factory settings. Please withdraw your funds before doing so to ensure that you don\'t lose them, and then complete the reset process. Access to the current wallet will not be possible after the reset.
Tokens in %1$s network are not supported by this card due to firmware limitation.
Are you having difficulty scanning your card?
This card is not designed to work with this app
Enable Default Fee to set transaction fees automatically and skip the Fee page when sending funds. You can always go back to this page if necessary.
Go to settings to enable biometric authentication in the Tangem App
This will delete all the saved wallet access codes. Any further operation with the wallet will require submitting the access code.
Removing the saved card deletes all the saved wallets and their access codes from the app.
Biometric authentication will be requested instead of the access code for interactions with your card.
Keep the wallet in the app
Enable to link all the wallets to Tangem app. Biometric authentication will be required for unlocking the app. Transaction signing requires tapping your Tangem card.
To hide or show your balances, simply flip your device screen down, or switch it off in Settings
Please try again in 30 seconds or scan the card
You have disabled biometric authentication on your phone and will not be able to save wallets in the app. To save wallets, please enable the biometric authentication function in your phone settings.
From your fiat card or bank account

Disable this option if you don\'t want this card to be used to reset access codes on other cards in this wallet. Please note that this will also prevent you from resetting the access code on this card.
Allows you to use this card to reset access code on other cards in this wallet
Are you sure you want to do this?
Access code will be changed on this card only
All cards in the selected wallet have been reset to factory settings. You can now create a new wallet.
Do you want to reset the next card in this wallet?
We recommend completing the reset process for all cards in this wallet
You haven\'t reset all your cards
In addition to network fee, the Cardano network charges %1$s ADA when transacting with the %2$s token
To make a %1$s transaction, you must deposit some ADA to cover the network fee and minimum ADA value (5 ADA recommended)
You must maintain some ADA because you have some tokens on the Cardano blockchain
You have not given access to your camera, please adjust your privacy settings
Network fees are charges users pay to process and confirm transactions. The fee amount can be affected by network congestion, transaction size, and execution priority. %s
Amount sent will be reduced by %1$s (%2$s) to cover the selected fee level
The server is not available, please try again later
There was an error. Please try again.
Decimal must be a valid integer, up to %li
The derivation path you\'ve entered is not valid
You can manually add a token that is not natively supported by Tangem
This token/network has already been added to your list
Note that tokens can be created by anyone. Be aware of adding scam tokens, they can cost nothing.
Be aware of adding scam tokens, they can cost nothing
Note that tokens can be created by anyone
You will have to submit the correct access code before scanning the card
This mechanism protects against proximity attacks on a card. It will enforce a delay between reception and execution of a command.
Before executing any command entailing a change of the card state, you will have to enter the passcode.
Flip your device screen down to quickly hide and show balances
Check your internet connection or switch to a different network
You have used a card from another wallet. Tap the card associated with this wallet
You haven\'t added any tokens yet. Add tokens via Market to swap
Tangem offers token swaps via 3rd-party providers according to each provider\'s terms
Oops! Swapping the selected pair through the chosen provider is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later. (Code: %s)
Selected provider is unavailable at the moment. Please try again later. (Code: %s)
Swaps are unavailable at the moment. Please try again later. (Code: %s)
Visit provider’s website to refund your money
Provider-sourced data. Estimated amount subject to change due to market conditions.
List of all tokens added to your wallet
By using swap functionality, you agree with provider’s %s
By using swap functionality, you agree with provider’s %1$s and %2$s
More providers are coming soon.\nStay tuned!
No tokens found. Please try another request
From another currency in your wallet
The following information is optional. You can erase it if you don\'t want to share it.
Tell us what functions you are missing, and we will try to help you.
Please tell us what card do you have
Please tell us more about your issue. Every small detail can help.
The network will charge a token approval fee to verify that you are authorizing the use of your token for the swap.
Specify the approve limit for the selected token

The Approve function is needed to grant permission to another address to use a specific amount of your tokens. By design, smart contracts can\'t access your tokens unless you approve. By \"unlocking\" your tokens, you authorize the StakeKit smart contract to use them. The network\'s miners receive a gas fee (paid by you) to record this action on the blockchain. You can stake your token after giving approval.
To continue you need to allow StakeKit smart contract to use your %s
To continue, grant %1s smart contracts permission to use your %2s
To change the access code tap the card as shown above and do not remove until the end of the operation
To change the passcode tap the card as shown above and do not remove until the end of the operation
To create the wallet tap the card as shown above and do not remove until the end of the operation
Tap the card #%s of the wallet
You have updated biometrics, scan your card to enter
Your balance should be higher than the fee value to make a transfer
You don\'t have enough Mana for this transaction. Please wait until the Mana is refilled. Your Mana balance is %1$s/%2$s
You can transfer only %s due to the Mana limit imposed by the Koinos network
The Koinos network requires Mana for network fees. Your have %1$s/%2$s Mana
To begin tracking your crypto assets and transactions, add tokens
To access all the networks you need to scan the card
Enjoy %1$s service fees on swaps via Changelly from February %2$s-%3$s
Blockchain the cryptocurrency was initially created

Using non-native networks for tokens enables cross-blockchain interoperability, allowing assets to be utilized in diverse decentralized applications and smart contracts across platforms. However, this often involves a custodian or smart contract to hold the original asset securely, introducing centralization and counterparty risk.
Not original or primary blockchain the token is hosted
Couldn’t find this token, you can add it manually
e.g. BTC I trust, hodl I must
The selected token is currently unavailable for actions within the crypto wallet. But worry not, you can express your interest by upvoting it.
The wallet doesn\'t support more than one network
To start buying, exchanging or receiving this asset, add this token to at least 1 network
To generate addresses for selected networks, you need to attach a Tangem card
The difference between buyers volume and sellers volume
The total number of coins that are available for trading and are circulating in the market
Net buyers with the additional requirement of having at least 100 outgoing transactions
The total theoretical value of a cryptocurrency if all coins that could exist are in circulation, including those not currently circulating
The change in the number of token holders within a specific timeframe
The change in how much liquidity is available for the token during the specified timeframe
The total market value of a cryptocurrency, calculated by multiplying the current price of the coin by the total number of coins in circulation
Position in crypto rating between all coins based on market capitalization
The maximum number of coins or tokens that can ever exist for a particular cryptocurrency
The total amount of a cryptocurrency that has been traded within the last 24 hours, indicating the level of activity and liquidity in the market
You have to set up a single access code to protect all your cards
You can set up an individual access code on each card later
The access code can be restored with a linked card. Don’t keep all cards at one place.
Choose any word, phrase, or number you want as your access code
Enter your access code one more time to avoid a mistake
Access code must be at least 4 characters long
Entered access code didn\'t match the initial access code
Please repeat the operation. The card will be reset to factory settings.
You\'ve added one backup card. When backup process is finished you can\'t add more backup cards. If you have one more card, add it to backup. Do you like to continue the backup process?
The backup process is partly complete. You can\'t exit it now.

The passphrase is an advanced security feature that crypto wallets use. It adds an extra word or phrase of your own choosing to your already existing recovery phrase to unlock a brand-new set of addresses.
Let\'s generate all the keys on your card and create a secure wallet
Your keys will be securely generated inside the card. There is no seed phrase, which means nobody can export or steal it.
Your card is activated and ready to be used
In this case, you will need to start from the beginning.
Do you want to exit the activation process?
Another wallet has already been created on the card you\'re trying to add. If you have funds in this wallet, please withdraw it and then reset this card and add it as a backup.

plurals.name: onboarding_seed_generate_message_words_count
plurals.item: Write these %d words down in the order given below and store them in a safe and secret place.

resources.string: To import your wallet, enter your seed phrase in the field below

A seed phrase is a series of words that allows you to recover your wallet. Unlike the keys generated by the card, seed phrases are unprotected and can be copied and stolen. Use this option at your own risk.
Invalid seed phrase. Please check the word order.
Invalid seed phrase. Please check your spelling.
To check whether you’ve written down your seed phrase correctly, please enter the 2nd, 7th and 11th words
To start the backup process add up to two backup cards.
You can add one more card or finalize the backup process
Prepare the backup card with number %s
Scan the primary card to start the backup process.
Prepare the primary card with number %s
Your wallet card is configured and ready for use.
Max number of cards added. Finalize the backup process.
To get started, simply top up the wallet with any amount
To get started, simply top up the wallet with more than %1$s %2$s
The twinning process is partly complete. You can\'t exit it now.
If the process of creating the wallet gets interrupted in any way, you\'ll have to start over
You can backup your keys up to two other blank Tangem Wallet cards.
Access code can be restored with one of backup cards.
All the backup cards can be used as full-functional with the identical keys.
You will be able to set an access code to protect your wallets.
You have not given access to your camera
Send only %s to this address. Sending any other currency will result in its irreversible loss.
Show QR-code or share your address
Failed to load the information about the referral program. Please try again later.
Failed to load the information about the referral program. Error code: %s. Please try again later.
Will get ^^%1$s^^ for each wallet bought by your friend on your %2$s network address %3$s ^^30 days after^^ that
when buying a wallet on tangem.com
By tapping this button you accept
I understand that after performing this action, I will no longer have access to the current wallet
I realize that I can\'t use this card to recover my access code on the other cards of the current wallet
Factory Reset will completely delete the wallet from the selected card. You will not be able to restore the current wallet or use the card to recover the access code.
Factory Reset will completely delete the wallet from the selected card and remove it from the app. You will not be able to restore the current wallet.
Do you have a bank card from another country and a residence permit or registration outside the Russian Federation?
Russian bank cards are not currently accepted
Log into the app and check your balance without scanning the card
Biometrics will be requested instead of the access code for interactions with your wallet
It looks like you have biometric authentication disabled, it is necessary to save wallets
Would you like to use biometrics?
Note that making a transaction with your funds will still require your card
Scan the card to change its settings. The changes will impact only the card you\'ve scanned and will not affect other cards tied to your wallet.
Already included in the entered address
The commission amount is %s times the recommended amount. Make sure that the custom settings are correct.
You specified a commission below the recommended amount, which could cause a delay in your transaction. Continue?
You can set your transaction fee by adjusting the value in the Satoshi per vByte field.
The fee that will be charged for your transaction. You can set your own value.
This is the cost you are willing to pay for each unit of gas. The higher the gas price, the faster your transaction will be processed. (Priority fee included)
The fee that a user can pay to miners or validators to expedite the inclusion of their transaction in a block.
The fee required for using each unspent transaction output (UTXO) in the Kaspa network. The more UTXOs you use in a transaction, the higher the fee will be.
Address is the same as wallet address
Invalid Tag. It won\'t be added to the transaction.
Invalid Memo. It won\'t be added to the transaction.
This is the maximum amount of gas that will be spent to complete a transaction or contract. A gas limit prevents unexpected or unlimited charges when executing a transaction.
This is the cost you are willing to pay for each unit of gas. The higher the gas price, the faster your transaction will be processed.
Insufficient funds for the transfer, as the total of the fee and transfer amount exceeds the existing balance
The account will be wiped from the blockchain if a balance goes below the existential deposit. Please leave %s on your balance.
The commission amount is %s times the recommended amount. Make sure that the custom settings are correct.
Due to the peculiarities of the %1$s network, the fee for transferring the entire balance is higher. To reduce the commission, you can leave %2$s.
The included commission exceeds the transfer amount, leading to a negative value
The minimum sending amount is %1$s. Please ensure that the remaining balance after sending will not be less than %2$s.
Target account is not created. Please change the amount to send.
The amount to send must be at least %s
Kindly be aware that your transaction may experience delays under specific fee settings
Due to %1$s limitations only %2$s UTXOs can fit in a single transaction. This means you can only send %3$s or less. You need to reduce the amount.
Please align your QR code with the square to scan it. Ensure you scan %s network address.
Ensure the receiving wallet address is on the %s network to avoid losing your tokens
A Memo/Destination Tag is a unique ID for differentiating transactions sent to the same recipient on the same network. Caution: Omitting a memo may lead to misplaced funds

A way of measuring Bitcoin transaction fees. It indicates the number of the smallest Bitcoin unit (Satoshi) for each virtual byte in a transaction. The higher the number, the faster the transaction will be processed by miners.
Tap any field to change it
You are sending **%1$s** including a network fee of %2$s
Transaction has been successfully signed and sent to the blockchain node. Wallet balance will be updated in a while
Prepare to scan card you want to setup.
This will remove the wallet from the application. The wallet itself can be added again.
To unstake your assets, click here.
The annual percentage return you can earn from participating in staking.
A way to receive staking rewards. It can be claimed automatically or manually.
This is a schedule that determines when participants in staking receive their rewards.
The period you must wait after requesting to withdraw funds from staking before the tokens become available.
The allocated time for activating participation in staking.
Staking allow you to earn %1s. Your staking rewards arrive every ~%2s days.
Check unstaked to claim your assets
Store your crypto assets secure while keeping private keys contained in your card
Up to 3 physical cards to one wallet
A hardware wallet for your Bitcoin, Ethereum and many more currencies simultaneously – all in one card
Use it on the go, anywhere, anytime. No wires or batteries. Just tap the card to your phone when you need your crypto.
Exchange, buy NFT\'s, make loans and deposits in more than 100 different decentralized services
Exchange more tokens at better rates directly in your wallet.
The amount includes:\n• service provider\'s fee\n• network fee for sending %s from the exchange back to the user\'s address.
The amount includes the service provider\'s fee.

All decentralized exchanges require approvals to prevent smart contracts from accessing your wallet without your permission. By design, smart contracts can\'t access your tokens unless you approve. By \"unlocking\" your tokens, you authorize the 1-inch smart contract to spend them. The network\'s miners receive a gas fee (paid by you) to record this action on the blockchain. You can swap your token after giving approval.
Fee estimation error. Please send feedback to support.
Swapping this amount of selected tokens will cause a significant price impact and reduce your outcome.
This operation is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
Buying %s is not available at the moment. Please check our updates.
You do not have funds to sell. Top up your account to be able to sell funds from it.
You do not have funds to send. Top up your account to be able to send funds from it.
Swapping %s is not available at the moment. Please check our updates.
Selling funds will be available once the pending transaction(s) in network %s is complete
Sending funds will be available once the pending transaction(s) in network %s is complete
Selling %s is not available at the moment. Please check our updates.
Staking %s is not available at the moment. Please check our updates.
You are about to hide this token from the main screen. You can add it back anytime through the manage tokens page.
Staking allows you to earn %1$s and get rewards every %2$s days
Earn up to %s staking rewards yearly
The %1$s (%2$s) token is the main currency on the %3$s network and cannot be hidden as long as you have other tokens on this network in the list
Exchange this token for another at %1$s service fees from February %2$s-%3$s.
You don\'t have any transactions yet
Failed to load transaction history.\nClick on reload button to update the information.
Transaction history is currently not supported for this blockchain. But don\'t worry, we\'re working on it! In the meantime you can check it in the explorer.
You\'ve scanned the same card. To create a twin wallet you need to scan the card with number %d
You\'ve scanned wrong twin card. Please try another one
This one that you are holding in your hands and the other one with number %s.\n\nBoth cards can be used to extract funds from this wallet.
This action is irreversible. You will not have access to the old wallet.
Tap the twin card with number %s and do not remove until the end of the operation
Use %s or scan a card to have an access to your wallet
Stay up to date with the latest features and news
Be the first to know about new promotions
Are you sure you want to delete this wallet?
An error has occurred, please scan your card to log in
This wallet has already been saved, you can add another one
The wallet with name %s already exists

Trade order for %1$s
Price: %2$s
Amount to receive: %3$s
Amount to pay: %4$s
Clipboard contain WalletConnect code. Use copied value or scan QR-code
Can\'t send transaction. Not enough funds.
Failed to establish WalletConnect session. Please, try again later.
Not all tokens were added to your list. Please add them first and try again. Missing tokens:\n
Failed to sign message.\nPlease, try again
Failed to establish WalletConnect session: timeout error. Please, try again later.
Session request contains unsupported blockchains for WalletConnect connection. Unsupported blockchains:\n
Connection with this Dapp cannot be established due to its technical implementation.
We\'ve encountered unknown error. Error message: %s. If the problem persists — feel free to contact our support
Wrong card selected in Tangem App
Failed to create transaction from Dapp data. Code: %s

%1$s

NETWORK: %2$s

URL: %3$s

This card can\'t be used to establish WalletConnect session
This network is not supported. Please select another network.
Connecting may take a few seconds
Use %s or scan a card to unlock access to your wallet
Please withdraw all funds from this wallet, reset it to factory settings, and create a new one. Access to the current wallet will be lost.

According to BNB network developers, support for the BEP-2 standard will end in June 2024. To avoid losing assets with this standard, please convert them to the BEP-20 standard. Use our swap service or third-party services to transfer funds to the BNB Smart Chain network.
BNB Beacon Chain will shut down
You are currently in the Demo mode
The card you scanned is a developer card. Do not use it to create your wallet.
%1$s network requires an Existential Deposit. If your account drops below %2$s, it will be deactivated, and any remaining funds will be destroyed.
Swap will be available after the %s transaction is complete
Swap approval is underway and will be completed shortly
The minimum swapping amount is %1$s. Please ensure that the remaining balance after the swap will not be less than %2$s.
You do not have any %s exchangeable coins in your list
To make a transaction you need to deposit some %1$s %2$s
The amount to receive must be at least %s
The amount of tokens to be swapped must not exceed %s
The amount to swap must be at least %s
Please change the amount to swap
This card might be a production sample or counterfeit
This token must be associated with your Hedera account before you can receive it. Association fee ~%1$s %2$s
This token must be associated with your Hedera account before you can receive it
Not enough %s. Top up your Hedera account to associate this token
Only %s signatures are left on this card. You must withdraw all of your funds.
Tokens on different networks can have different addresses. Double-check that your address matches the network when you transfer funds.

Use your card to get an addresses for %d networks

resources.string: The network is currently unreachable. Please try again later.
Your wallet hasn\'t been backed up. Carry out this procedure to protect your assets now.
This card has been previously used for transactions. If received from an untrusted source, consider withdrawing all funds. If it\'s your card, no action is required.
Your review keeps us motivated to make Tangem Wallet even better
You must associate your token before receiving tokens
%1$s is an asset in the %2$s network. To make a %3$s transaction, you must deposit some %4$s (%5$s) to cover the network fee.
The Solana network is congested. If your transaction is not processed within 2 minutes, please repeat the transaction.
Solana network charges a rent of %1$s every 2 days. Accounts that can\'t afford the rent are purged from the network. Deposit your account with more than %2$s to use it for free.
Some networks currently are unreachable. Please try again later.
This is a Testnet card. It cannot process transactions and should only be used for testing and development purposes.
You have an interrupted backup. Do you want to resume?
If you will discard the backup now, then you will have to reset the cards to factory settings to start over again
Use %s or scan a card to access the app
